title: Black Friday Kindle book deals save a ton for Amazon’s ereaders
author: david-lumb
summary: The best new Kindle book discounts we’ve found
article: We’re already seeing plenty of Black Friday deals on gadgets that will appeal to readers, including Black Friday tablet deals and Black Friday Kindle deals. But once you get your new devices to read on...what will you read? Here are the best Black Friday Kindle book deals we’ve found.

Like any bookstore, Amazon’s online Kindle storefront has deals on individual titles from a variety of genres, so check out Amazon's full ebook list to see if there’s more up your alley than the deals below – we’ve tried to pick some big names and great values, but dive into the Amazon Kindle Store deals to find more that may appeal to your tastes.
